original_text: You say, “Our ancestors killed God's prophets long ago. If we had lived at that time, we would not have helped our ancestors to do that.”
korean_text: 만일 우리가 조상 때에 있었더라면 우리는 그들이 선지자의 피를 흘리는 데 참여하지 아니하였으리라 하니

sentences.original_text: “Our ancestors killed God's prophets long ago
sentences.korean_translation: 우리 조상들이 오래전에 하나님의 선지자들을 죽였다고

sentences.original_text: If we had lived at that time
we would not have helped our ancestors
